displayName.english: You Can't Fight In Here, This Is The Control Room
displayName.spanish: Aquí no puedes combatir, es la sala de control
displayName.brazilian: Você não pode brigar aqui na Sala de Controle
displayName.hungarian: Itt nem harcolhattok, ez az irányítóterem
displayName.polish: Tu nie można walczyć, to jest sterownia
displayName.portuguese: Proibido Lutar na Sala de Controlo
displayName.german: Hier nicht kämpfen, das ist der Kontrollraum
displayName.ukrainian: Тут не можна битися, це ж центр керування
displayName.danish: I kan ikke slås her, det her er kontrolrummet
displayName.dutch: U kunt hier niet vechten, dit is de controlekamer
displayName.japanese: ここでは戦えません、ここは制御室です
displayName.schinese: 你不可在此战斗，这里是控制室
displayName.french: Combats interdits en salle de contrôle
displayName.italian: Qui dentro non puoi combattere, è la sala controllo
displayName.koreana: 여기서 싸울 수 없습니다. 이곳은 제어실입니다.
displayName.tchinese: 你不能在此打鬥，這裡是控制室

displayName.italian: Ecco cosa succede quando incontri uno Zed sulle Alpi
